text:
Sunnyvale, CA - 1 full time, 1 contractor - Local only

Aerohive Networks - http://www.aerohive.com/

Requirements - Strong knowledge in Object Oriented JavaScript Proficient at writing efficient and reusable UI code Experience with HTML5 and Responsive design and Ajax Strong understanding of web standards and cross-browser compatibility

Please email me at vrao@aerohive.com if you love building awesome web interfaces and like working in a fun team.
